title: Vegetable Soup (Cream) Recipe for Babies
content:
This is my cream of vegetable soup. I add little cow’s milk in her baby foods. I added some in her soups too. Especially this veg soup taste so good when you add some milk. But if your baby is less than 1 year. You can simply leave it out.

 

Things to remember when making soups:

 

1)Always wash your veggies really well.

2)You can use any veggies of your choice.

3)You can feed this soup in the evening, this makes a light before dinner meal for your baby.

4)If your baby needs some taste in their food, you can add some salt too.

5)If your baby is less than 1 year old, don't add milk in this. Cow’s Milk should be given to babies for more than 1 year.

 

How to sterilize baby feeding bowls: 

Start by sterilizing the bowls and spoons which you are going to feed your baby. Take the bowl and spoon in a large saucepan, cover it with water and bring them to a boil. Boil it rapidly for 5 mins. Now you can turn the heat off and leave them to stay in the hot water till use. 

 

How to Make Cream of Veg Soup:

 

Ingredients:

 

Potatoes – 1/4 of a small one peeled and chopped

Carrots – 1/4 of a small one chopped

Beans – 2 chopped

Cauliflower – 2 small pieces chopped

Garlic – 1 clove

Water – 1/2 cup

Milk – 3 tablespoon boiled (use if your baby is more than 1 year)

 

 

Method:

Take all veggies in a pressure cooker, add in water and garlic. Pressure cook for 3 whistles. Turn off the heat and let the pressure go all by itself. 

Open the cooker and add it in a blender. Puree it finely.

Add in boiled milk and puree again.

Pour into a bowl and feed your baby.
